name: The last talk
description:
Story:

Alexander has a monotonous and routine life, until one day a little girl with cat ears sneaks into his house and offers him to have tea with her.

Extra details:

This is a short and linear visual novel that has a few decisions which, although they do not affect the development of the plot, reveal some information about the two characters that make up the story. 

Donations by PayPal: 

If you like this little project and you want to support me, you can help by donating through my paypal link
